text: The Louisiana blues is a type of blues music with slow rhythm which makes the sound dark and tense. ==Louisiana blues musicians== *Nathan Abshire *Marcia Ball *Guitar Junior *Slim Harpo *Jessie Hill *Lazy Lester *Lightnin' Slim *Raful Neal *Tabby Thomas *Katie Webster *Robert Pete Williams *Snooks Eaglin Category:Blues music
title: Louisiana blues
